content: left needle repeat from * until 6 total sts remain break yarn leaving an 8″ / 20cm tail place the first 3 sts onto your right needle and the last 3 sts onto your left needle with the purl bumps facing each other and both needles pointing to the right graft the remaining 6 sts together using kitchener stitch watch this westknits video to assist with the i-cord grafting https //youtu be/7yn6-ih2p_m weave in ends blocking is optional scarf shown was lightly blocked to smooth the fabric watch this westknits video to assist with weaving in the ends https //youtu be/33nkcgk27rq © 2010 stephen west all rights reserved pattern for personal use only questions support@westknits com 3 photography by westknits version 2
